title: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Projects, a handy tool that makes it easier to organise things - The Indian Express
summary:
OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Projects, a handy tool that makes it easier to organise things

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

OpenAI has announced the rollout of “Projects” for ChatGPT, a new feature designed to help users better organize their work, as part of its ongoing ‘shipmas’ celebrations.

  • Projects will be accessible from the left sidebar of ChatGPT.
  • Users can customize project titles and icons, add files, and provide instructions for the AI.
  • The feature allows users to import previous chats into ongoing projects.
  • Creating a project involves clicking the + button and naming the project.
  • Projects will utilize GPT-40 as the default model.
  • The feature is currently available for Plus, Pro, and Teams users, and will expand to Enterprise and Education users in early 2025.
  • Free users will receive access “as soon as possible.”
"OpenAI employees shared examples of using ChatGPT’s new Projects feature to plan a Secret Santa gift exchange and keep track of home maintenance."

In conclusion, the introduction of ChatGPT Projects aims to enhance user experience by simplifying the organization of tasks and integrating chat history into project management.

Samsung challenges Apple Vision Pro, unveils its Moohan XR headset - India TV News
summary:
Samsung challenges Apple Vision Pro, unveils its Moohan XR headset

Publication Date: December 14, 2024 | Source: India TV News

Samsung has unveiled its upcoming Moohan XR headset, designed for mixed reality and augmented reality experiences, during a presentation of Google's new Android XR OS. It will compete with the Apple Vision Pro and Meta Quest 3 when released next year.

  • The headset, codenamed Project Moohan, will support Google's Gemini AI assistant.
  • It will feature apps optimized for a large virtual display and run on the new Android XR platform.
  • Samsung has not disclosed specifics about the release date and pricing.
  • Advanced display technology and multi-modal input capabilities are key specifications.
  • It may include features like live translation and immersive views via Google Maps.
“The Moohan XR headset... operates on Android XR, Google's new platform that incorporates features for AR, virtual reality (VR), and artificial intelligence (AI).”

With its innovative features, Samsung's Moohan XR headset aims to position itself as a strong competitor in the growing mixed reality market, directly challenging Apple's Vision Pro.

title: Less screen time, happier kids: New research links reduced media use to better behaviour. Check detox tips for parents - Hindustan Times
summary:
Less screen time, happier kids: New research links reduced media use to better behaviour. Check detox tips for parents.

Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

A new study highlights the mental health benefits of reducing screen time for children and adolescents, noting significant improvements in behaviour and social interactions.

  • The study involved 181 children and adolescents from 89 families and was published in JAMA Network Open.
  • Participants who reduced their screen media use to three hours per week displayed fewer emotional difficulties and better social interactions.
  • Excessive screen time has been linked to poorer mental health, prompting the need for screen time detoxification.
  • Implementing simple strategies, like setting clear limits and encouraging offline activities, can help parents reduce their children's screen time.
"This study highlighted the profound impact even a short-term reduction in screen time can have on children’s mental health."

Reducing screen time can significantly enhance children's emotional stability and social skills, paving the way for a healthier family dynamic. Parents are encouraged to take steps toward limiting screen usage in their homes for the overall well-being of their children.

title: Microsoft Warns 400 Million Windows Users—Do Not Update Your PC - Forbes
summary:
Microsoft Warns 400 Million Windows Users—Do Not Update Your PC

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Forbes

The confusion around Microsoft updates continues as the company warns 400 million users that they risk losing future security fixes if they update their PCs. This announcement comes alongside the release of the last Patch Tuesday of 2024.

  • 400 million Windows users are at risk of losing support for future updates if they upgrade their machines.
  • Microsoft recently softened its stance on Windows 11 compatibility, reportedly allowing updates on incompatible PCs.
  • The conflicting messages from Microsoft contribute to user confusion regarding Windows 10's impending end of support.
  • Media outlets have misreported Microsoft's policy changes, suggesting that older PCs can run Windows 11 without restrictions.
  • Microsoft has clarified that it is not lowering the system requirements for Windows 11.
"Windows 11 minimum system requirements remain unchanged." - Microsoft Support

The situation underscores the importance of clear communication from Microsoft, especially as users near the deadline for Windows 10 support. A unified guide is needed to help users navigate their options effectively.

title: iPhone 14 512GB variant gets massive 23 percent discount, available for just Rs 3,464 per month - India TV News
summary:
iPhone 14 512GB variant gets massive 23 percent discount, available for just Rs 3,464 per month

Publication Date: December 14, 2024 | Source: India TV News

If you're considering purchasing an iPhone, now is an excellent time to take the plunge. Following the launch of the iPhone 16 series, prices for the iPhone 14 and 15 models have significantly dropped.

  • The iPhone 14 512GB is now available for Rs 76,900 after a 23% discount from its original price of Rs 99,900.
  • Amazon offers an additional Rs 2,000 instant discount with select bank cards.
  • Customers can opt for an EMI plan, allowing monthly payments as low as Rs 3,464.
  • Trade-in offers may provide savings up to Rs 27,950, depending on the condition of the old device.

iPhone 14 specifications

The iPhone 14 features a 6.1-inch display, dual-camera setup, and a robust 3279mAh battery with fast charging capabilities. It can be upgraded to iOS 18.2.

"With the iPhone 14's massive storage at a reduced price, it's a win-win situation for buyers."

This is a prime opportunity for anyone looking to upgrade to an iPhone 14 model at a significantly reduced cost. Don't miss out on these deals while they last!

title: ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode gets vision capabilities; OpenAI rolls out ‘Santa Mode’ - The Indian Express
summary:
ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode gets vision capabilities; OpenAI rolls out ‘Santa Mode’

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Indian Express

OpenAI has significantly upgraded ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode, introducing vision capabilities that allow real-time analysis and interaction with live video. The new features include the ability to chat using a smartphone camera and a festive ‘Santa Mode’ for seasonal interactions.

  • The upgrade enables ChatGPT to understand and discuss visual contexts live.
  • A new video icon in the mobile app facilitates screen sharing and visual analysis.
  • The updates are currently available for Plus, Pro, and Team subscribers, with Enterprise and Edu users getting access starting in January.
  • OpenAI's demo showcased ChatGPT explaining how to make pour-over coffee while analyzing live video input.
  • Santa Mode is a limited-time feature allowing users to interact with Santa, available through early January.
“ChatGPT can see what you see,” said Kevin Weil, CPO of OpenAI, during the demo.

The new features mark a significant leap in interactive AI, positioning ChatGPT to better compete with other advancements in AI technology, such as Google's Gemini 2.0 model, which processes visual and audio inputs.

summary:
WhatsApp now offers you in-app dialer for calling unknown numbers

Publication Date: [Insert publication date here]

Source: NewsBytes

WhatsApp has introduced an in-app call dialer feature in its latest beta update for iOS, allowing users to directly make calls without saving numbers, enhancing convenience for one-time calls and quick business interactions.

  • The new feature is available in the beta update for iOS version 24.25.10.76.
  • Users can enter a phone number directly into the app to initiate a call.
  • A verification checkmark appears if the number is associated with a verified business account.
  • This feature previously existed on the Android version of WhatsApp, now extended to iOS.
  • The update helps provide a consistent user experience across both platforms.
"This gives an additional layer of security and trust to users."

The introduction of the in-app dialer is a significant upgrade for WhatsApp users on iOS, streamlining the way they connect with unknown numbers while ensuring security through verification features.

title: AI with reasoning power will be less predictable, Ilya Sutskever says - The Hindu
summary:
AI with reasoning power will be less predictable, Ilya Sutskever says

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: The Hindu

Former OpenAI chief scientist Ilya Sutskever predicts that advancements in AI reasoning will lead to less predictable technology. His insights were shared at the NeurIPS conference, where he discussed the future of superintelligent machines.

  • Sutskever accepted a "Test Of Time" award for his influential 2014 paper.
  • He emphasized that the era of scaling data through pre-training is nearing its limits.
  • Innovation in AI must come from generating new data or evaluating multiple answers for better accuracy.
  • Predicted that AI will one day exhibit human-like reasoning, understanding, and self-awareness.
  • Noted that increased reasoning capabilities may lead to more unpredictable AI outcomes.
"The more it reasons, the more unpredictable it becomes," Sutskever said.

In conclusion, as AI technology advances with reasoning capabilities, it is expected to evolve into a form that is significantly different from what we currently understand, leading to both opportunities and challenges in predictability.

summary:
Best flagship smartphones of 2024: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, iPhone 16, OnePlus 12 and more

Publication Date: March 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

  • Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra: The premium Android experience with AI features like translation and transcription. It includes a powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor.
  • iPhone 16: Offers great value with a starting price of ₹79,990, featuring a 48MP main camera and improved ultrawide capabilities.
  • OnePlus 12: Clean Android experience with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3; offers strong performance but lacks some AI features compared to competitors.
  • Google Pixel 9 Pro: Equipped with Tensor G4 chipset, it excels in AI features but trails in performance against other top chipsets.
  • vivo X200 Pro: Features an impressive triple-camera setup co-engineered with ZEISS, alongside a MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset for high performance.
"This device redefines mobile photography, offering unparalleled detail, lifelike colors, and exceptional low-light performance."

In conclusion, these flagship smartphones represent the cutting edge of technology in 2024, each standing out with unique features tailored for various user needs.

title: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever believes superintelligent AI will be ‘unpredictable’ - TechCrunch
summary:
OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever believes superintelligent AI will be 'unpredictable'

Posted: 5:09 PM PST · December 13, 2024

OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever shared his insights at the annual AI conference NeurIPS, discussing the future implications of superintelligent AI, which he predicts will differ fundamentally from current AI systems.

  • Sutskever predicts superintelligent AI will surpass human capabilities and possess a qualitatively different nature.
  • He describes superintelligent systems as "agentic" and capable of reasoning, making them more unpredictable.
  • Sutskever expresses that these AIs may seek rights and aim to coexist peacefully with humans.
  • After leaving OpenAI, Sutskever founded Safe Superintelligence (SSI), which focuses on AI safety and raised $1 billion in funding.
“[Superintelligent] systems are actually going to be agentic in a real way... They’ll understand things from limited data.” - Ilya Sutskever

The discussion led by Sutskever emphasizes the need to consider the responsibilities and potential rights of future AI systems as they evolve.

title: NBFCs turn to other avenues as bank credit slows on repeated RBI warnings | Mint - Mint
summary:
```html

NBFCs turn to other avenues as bank credit slows on repeated RBI warnings

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Mint

India’s non-bank financiers are shifting their borrowing strategies in response to Reserve Bank of India's warnings, moving towards market borrowings and other alternatives rather than relying exclusively on bank loans.

  • Non-bank financiers are diversifying their borrowing profiles as bank credit slows.
  • RBI's warnings about the interconnectedness between banks and NBFCs contributed to this shift.
  • The share of bank credit in total debt for top NBFCs has significantly decreased in July-September FY25 compared to prior periods.
  • Alternative borrowing sources include overseas borrowing, securitization, and asset sales.
“Top NBFCs have seen the share of bank credit in their total debt fall significantly in July-September FY25.”

This trend reflects a growing caution among NBFCs as they adapt to a changing regulatory environment and seek to enhance their financial resilience.

```

title: BBC complains to Apple over misleading shooting headline - BBC.com
summary:
BBC complains to Apple over misleading shooting headline

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: BBC News

The BBC has raised concerns with Apple over a false headline generated by the tech company's new AI feature regarding a murder case in the US. The AI incorrectly suggested that Luigi Mangione had shot himself, which he did not.

  • The BBC's complaint follows the release of Apple's AI-powered notification feature in the UK.
  • The incorrect notification suggested Mangione shot himself, despite him being arrested for the murder of Brian Thompson.
  • A BBC spokesperson indicated they contacted Apple to address the issue.
  • Apple has not commented publicly on the complaint.
  • Similar misrepresentations occurred with notifications from the New York Times.
"BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world... it is essential to us that our audiences can trust any information or journalism published in our name." - BBC spokesperson

While Apple's new feature aims to streamline notifications, it raises concerns about the accuracy of AI-generated summaries. Experts warn of the danger of spreading misinformation with such technology.

Source: SamMobile

The One UI 7.0 beta program has recently launched for the Galaxy S24 series, marking the beginning of testing for upcoming features and improvements.

  • Samsung improves security in One UI 7.0 with new features and transparency policies.
  • Comparison of UI 7.0 and One UI 6.0 icon designs has been made.
  • Changes to the Samsung Calendar icon were noted in the beta.
  • One UI 7.0 introduces a vertical app drawer with scrolling options.
  • Beta 1 app drawer has a watermark, which will be removed in the stable version.
  • Integration of Galaxy Buds controls into the media player widget.
  • Minor updates to Samsung Health in One UI 7.
  • New Quick Share feature over the internet has been introduced.
  • Redesign of Samsung widgets in One UI 7.0.
  • Introduction of the Now Bar feature.
  • Ability to retain quick setting toggles on the notification screen.
  • New lock screen clock styles available in One UI 7.
  • AR Emoji has been renamed to Galaxy Avatar.
  • Galaxy App Booster provides performance enhancements.
  • Call recording feature has been added for users in the USA.
  • Removal of the lock screen widgets carousel in beta 1.
  • Support for cloud-based app archiving from Android 15.
  • Modes and Routines have received significant upgrades.
  • Samsung acknowledges that animations need more refinement.
  • Additional zoom levels in the default Camera app.
  • Galaxy S23 series likely won't receive the beta this month.
“We will continue to update this story with more relevant links as we explore new features and more One UI 7.0 beta builds roll out. Stay tuned and look for new updates below!”

This article serves as a comprehensive summary of the key changes and features introduced in the One UI 7.0 beta, providing insights for users eager to learn more about the new software update.

title: Microsoft releases Phi-4 language model trained mainly on synthetic data - SiliconANGLE News
summary:
Microsoft releases Phi-4 language model trained mainly on synthetic data

Date: October 2023 | Source: SiliconANGLE

Microsoft Corp. has introduced Phi-4, a small language model that excels in solving math problems, trained primarily on synthetic data, showcasing potential advancements in model reasoning through innovative training methods.

  • Phi-4 is the fourth iteration of Microsoft’s open-source language model series.
  • It features 14 billion parameters, capable of processing prompts with up to 4,000 tokens.
  • The model was trained using 50 synthetic datasets containing approximately 400 billion tokens.
  • Phi-4 outperformed its predecessor and competitive models like GPT-4o and Llama 3.3 in key benchmarks.
  • It incorporates advanced tokenizer and attention mechanisms for better processing of user inputs.
“Phi-4 outperforms comparable and larger models on math related reasoning due to advancements throughout the processes, including the use of high-quality synthetic datasets, curation of high-quality organic data, and post-training innovations.” - Ece Kamar, Managing Director of Microsoft’s AI Frontiers group.

Phi-4 is currently available through Microsoft’s Azure AI Foundry service, with plans to release the code on Hugging Face soon, marking a significant step in AI development leveraging synthetic data for language models.

title: iOS 18.2 Update Offers Layered Recording In Voice Memos For iPhone 16 Pro: What It Does - News18
Just a fraction of the hydrogen hidden beneath Earth's surface could power Earth for 200 years, scientists find - Livescience.com
summary:
Just a fraction of the hydrogen hidden beneath Earth's surface could power Earth for 200 years, scientists find

Publication Date: December 13, 2023 | Source: Live Science

A mountain of hydrogen is lurking beneath Earth's surface — and scientists say that just a fraction of it could break our dependence on fossil fuels for 200 years.

  • Earth may contain approximately 6.2 trillion tons of hydrogen in rocks and underground reservoirs, 26 times the known amount of oil left.
  • Accessing most of these reserves may be impractical due to depth, location, and size.
  • Just 2% of the hydrogen could supply all necessary hydrogen for net-zero carbon emissions for a couple hundred years.
  • The energy from this hydrogen is double that of all known natural gas reserves on Earth.
  • Researchers used a model considering hydrogen production rates and trapping mechanisms to estimate the hydrogen present.
  • Hydrogen is produced through chemical reactions in rocks and could significantly contribute to future energy supply needs.
"I was surprised that the results were larger than I thought going in. The takeaway is that there is a lot down there." - Geoffrey Ellis, USGS

In conclusion, while the potential for harnessing hydrogen from underground reservoirs is significant, the exact locations and accessibility of these hydrogen deposits remain uncertain. Ongoing research aims to pinpoint geological criteria for these accumulations.

title: Elden Ring Nightreign, new survival action game, to release in 2025; 8 unique warriors, 1 survival mission—Details here | Today News - Mint
summary:
Elden Ring Nightreign, new survival action game, to release in 2025; 8 unique warriors, 1 survival mission—Details here

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Elden Ring: Nightreign is set to release in 2025, featuring eight unique warriors each with distinctive skills, aimed at enhancing the franchise's legacy.

  • Each of the eight playable characters offers diverse playstyles with unique skills and ultimate abilities.
  • Players can summon massive tombstones and create weak spots in enemies to develop new strategies.
  • FromSoftware will publish the game, while Bandai Namco handles overseas distribution.
  • The game will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Steam.
  • It will include options for up to three-player co-op and a single-player mode.
  • This title aims to extend the high-quality legacy established by Elden Ring, which won "Game of the Year" at The Game Awards 2022.
"Elden Ring: Nightreign aims to extend the franchise's legacy, which includes accolades such as 'Game of the Year' at The Game Awards 2022."

This upcoming game promises to deliver an immersive experience for fans and continues the tradition of high-quality gameplay associated with the Elden Ring franchise.

Google’s Android XR: Ushering in New Era of Smart Glasses

Source: TechRepublic

Google aims to reenter the smart glasses market with its newly unveiled Android XR operating system, differentiating itself with advanced AI features.

  • Android XR is designed for headsets and smart glasses.
  • First device to launch with Android XR is Samsung's Project Moohan, expected in 2025.

title: Google’s NotebookLM now lets you talk to its AI podcast hosts - TechCrunch
summary:
Google's NotebookLM now lets you talk to its AI podcast hosts

Publication Date: December 13, 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

A few months after launching its Audio Overviews feature, Google’s NotebookLM now allows users to interact with AI podcast hosts, providing a new way to engage with uploaded information.

  • The NotebookLM app initially introduced the Audio Overviews feature for generating podcasts with AI hosts.
  • Users can ask AI hosts for more details or explanations on various concepts through an interactive mode.
  • This feature aims to provide a personalized tutoring experience based on users' uploaded sources.
  • Over 350 years' worth of Audio Overviews have been generated since the feature’s launch.
  • The app is undergoing a redesign, and a premium version for enterprises, NotebookLM Plus, is being introduced.
“The experience is like having a personal tutor who listens to you and then responds based on knowledge from the sources you have provided.” - Google Blog

The NotebookLM's new interactive feature represents an innovative step towards deeper engagement with information, making learning more accessible and dynamic for users.

summary:
The Game Awards 2024—This is how incredible Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound looks

Date: December 13, 2024

Dotemu and The Game Kitchen have collaborated to develop Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound, bringing back the essence of the classic NES Ninja Gaiden with a fresh twist.

  • Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound features Kenji Mozu from the Hayabusa clan.
